name: cnmgpabl
body: -| wceq(c0, co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))))

body.origin:
|- wcel(c0, cabl)
-| wcel(ccnfld, ccrg)
-| wi(wcel(ccnfld, ccrg), wcel(c0, cabl))
body.pretty:
⊢ c0 ∈ Abel
⊣ CCfld ∈ CRing
⊣ (CCfld ∈ CRing → c0 ∈ Abel)

-| wceq(c0, co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cdif(cc, csn(nat0))))
body.pretty:
⊢ (CCfld ∈ CRing → c0 ∈ Abel)
⊣ (ℂ \ { 0 })=(Unit ` CCfld)
⊣ c0 =((mulGrp ` CCfld)[|`s](ℂ \ { 0 }))
